content: *this pattern will be available for free as a video tutorial on my blog within 90 days of the pdf pattern release here * https //www sweetsofties com/2023/07/pocket-mouse html the pocket mouse is a no-sew pattern that is quick and easy to work up a full video tutorial is included making this a beginner-friendly project its small size makes this amigurumi perfect as a keychain or christmas tree ornament however you can also use super bulky chenille velvet or blanket yarn with this same pattern to turn it into a larger plush for little hands to play with make these mice for craft fairs markets or kids party favors this unisex and gender neutral stuffed animal will appeal to all boys girls children adults and everyone in between it s a great last-minute birthday gift and holiday gift this plushie can also be used for therapy as a sensory fidget or stress relief object this pocket sized plush makes a portable friend especially for people with anxiety adhd/add or autism the pdf pattern includes full written instructions and 40+ photos as a step-by-step photo tutorial to guide you through the doll making process **size** height 2 5 inches 6 cm based on yarn & hook in material list **materials** hobbii friends cotton 8/8 medium weight 4 yarn in desired colors 3 25mm crochet hook 6mm plastic safety eyes x2 stuffing scissors note on materials this versatile pattern can be made with different yarn weights remember to use a hook size appropriate to the yarn weight to crochet tight stitches without gaps **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner/intermediate requires familiarity with stitches used below attaching yarn and working on a small scale **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off yo = yarn over chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together double_crochet = double_crochet *copyright notice this pattern
